original_text: He put shields and spears in all the cities, and made them very strong. So Judah and Benjamin were his.
korean_text: 모든 성읍에 방패와 창을 두어 매우 강하게 하니라 유다와 베냐민이 르호보암에게 속하였더라

sentences.original_text: He put shields and spears in all the cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 도시에 방패와 창을 두었다

sentences.original_text: So Judah and Benjamin were his
